outline:
1. to found, fix, establish, lay foundation
    1. (Qal) to found, establish, begin
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to fix or seat themselves close together, sit in conclave
      2. to be founded
    3. (Piel)
      1. to found
      2. to establish, appoint, ordain
    4. (Pual) to be founded, be laid
    5. (Hophal) to be founded
kjv_def: appoint, take counsel, establish, (lay the, lay for a) found(-ation), instruct, lay, ordain, set, [idiom] sure.
strongs_def: to set (literally or figuratively); intensively, to found; reflexively, to sit down together, i.e. settle, consult
